basics.name: Nathan Stangler
basics.label: Computer Science and Data Science double major at the University of Minnesota

work.name: Best Buy
highlights: Trained new employees on technical aspects of mobile device activations and setup
Provided technical support for customers by using critical thinking skills to ease concerns
Collaborated with team members to promote sales and productivity through organizing daily tasks and creative thinking

projects.name: Daily Rewards
highlights: Developed and commercially launched a fully configurable daily rewards system for Garry's Mod, generating 100+ sales on Gmodstore
Integrated MySQL and SQLite database support, with seamless interaction from a custom designed user interface using client-server communication through networking protocols

projects.name: Imporved Scoreboard
highlights: Designed and developed a scalable, object oriented, and event driven Minecraft network packet-based scoreboard plugin compatible with multiple game versions
Integrated with third-party applications through the creation of a portable scoreboard management API
